definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
local differences in price/regional price variation

sentences.english: Liquidity in banned shares is down and bid-ask spreads are up.
sentences.chinese: 被禁止卖空的股票流动性下降，买卖差价增加。

sentences.english: Solving the issues of peak adjustment gas price and regional gap in the price.
sentences.chinese: 研究解决调峰气价与地区差价问题。

sentences.english: To our surprise the price difference turned out 200 euro.
sentences.chinese: 令我们吃惊的差价实际的居然原来多达200欧元。

sentences.english: With regards to transactions in CFDs, Clients are required to deposit a Margin with the Company in order to open a position.
sentences.chinese: 在交易差价合约时，客户需要存入保证金才能开仓。

sentences.english: With most CFDs you can hold the position for as long as you like.
sentences.chinese: 大多数差价合约可以让阁下无限期持仓。

sentences.english: In China, there usually is no such differential.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，通常没有这样的差价。

sentences.english: The Family Trust then sued the Flemings for the shortfall on the sale and interest.
sentences.chinese: 家庭信托随后起诉复莱明，索两者差价及利息。

sentences.english: Price-matching policy is a kind of retailer's price strategy.
sentences.chinese: 差价补偿策略是零售商的一种整体价格宣传策略。

sentences.english: Every agent takes a cut in the form of a spread or commission.
sentences.chinese: 每一个中间人都会以佣金或差价的形式提取份额。

sentences.english: Trade generally lively when enter the arena talent is promising achieve earnings of short-term price difference .
sentences.chinese: 大凡交易热闹时进场，才有希望获得短期的差价收益。

sentences.english: Dandy reserves the right to change the swap value applicable to the CFDs on a daily basis and inform Client.
sentences.chinese: 丹迪有权每天修改差价合同的隔夜利息并通知客户。

sentences.english: The difference in cost per square yard saves approximately US S10 000.
sentences.chinese: 每平方码的成本差价可以带来大约1万美元的节省。

sentences.english: If you rip me off, I'll come back and ask for a refund.
sentences.chinese: 被我发现你宰客的话，我就回来找你补差价。

sentences.english: The first wave of purchases was to arbitrage the difference between spot and futures prices.
sentences.chinese: 第一波购买行情是为了套取现货期货市场间的差价。

sentences.english: When the manager arrives, Gault asks her to at least meet her halfway.
sentences.chinese: 当经理到来时，高尔特要求她至少便宜一半的差价。

sentences.english: We will appreciate if you only earn the difference of prices on operating expense .
sentences.chinese: 我们将很感激如果你们可以只赚取操作费的差价。

definition: to make a profit/to earn a packet
